MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the TD3 and TD4 postcode areas of Gordon and Earlston. We are aware of multiple power cuts in your area today and we apologise for this. Our emergency response team are on site investigating the fault and will work to restore supplies by 9:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:37pm on Friday, 19 February 2021
